headline.main: SHIPSTEAD ATTACKS HULL ON FINLAND; Offers in Senate Resolution to Disavow Secretary's Plea to Accept Soviet Peace

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 10 -- A demand that Secretary of State Cordell Hull, cease his reported threats to Finland that she will lose this country's friendship unless she ceases fighting Soviet Russia was offered in the Senate today by Senator Henrik Shipstead, Republican, of Minnesota.
abstract: Sen H Shipstead attacks Hull policy on Finland
